text: Muham'mada (sallallaho alaihe vasallama) allahaka rasula hun ra juna manisaharu unako sathama chan kaphiraharuko lagi kathora chan ra apasama dayalu. Timile uniharula'i ruku'aîma, sajadama, allahako udara anugraha ra usako prasannata cahirakheko dekhnechaum. Uniharuko anuharamathi sijdako cinha cha. Tiniharuko yahi visesataharu tauraitama cha ra injilama pani tyasa kheti jastai ullekhita cha, jasale aphno ankura nikalyo, ani usala'i sakti puryayo ra tyo moto bhayo ra tyo aphno tanamathi (damthama) sidha khada bhayo ra kisanala'i prasanna pareko cha, taki uniharulegarda inkara garneharuko hrdayama isrya utpanna gara'os. Yi imanavalaharu ra asala karma garneharusita allahale ksama ra thulo pratiphalako vaca gareko cha
